com.code10.kts.controller

Class CommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.code10.kts.controller.CommentController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/buildings/{buildingId}/malfunctions/{malfunctionId}/comments")
public class CommentController
extends java.lang.Object
    REST controller for managing a malfunction's comments.

      • create

        @PostMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.canComment(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity create(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  long malfunctionId,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                  CommentCreateDto commentCreateDto)
        POST /api/buildings/buildingID/malfunctions/malfunctionID/comments Creates a new comment for a malfunction.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        malfunctionId - building's malfunction ID
        commentCreateDto - DTO with comment
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity with created comment's ID

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.canComment(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity delete(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long malfunctionId,
                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   long id)
        DELETE /api/buildings/buildingID/malfunctions/malfunctionID/comments/ID Deletes a malfunction's comment.
        Parameters:
        buildingId - building ID
        malfunctionId - building's malfunction ID
        id - malfunction's comment ID
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity

      • findAll

        @GetMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="@userService.canComment(#buildingId)")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity findAll(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  long buildingId,
                                                                                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  long malfunctionId)
        GET /api/buildings/buildingID/malfunctions/malfunctionID/comments Gets all malfunction's comments.

        malfunctionId - building's malfunction ID
